Episodes.Title: In Seldon's Shadow
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Hari finds himself trapped in a mysterious prison. An assassination attempt leaves Day shaken. Gaal and Salvor devise an escape plan.

Episodes.Title: A Glimpse of Darkness
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Gaal has a disturbing vision. Day's bond with Queen Sareth grows stronger. The Vault opens and reveals a cryptic message.

Episodes.Title: King and Commoner
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: The Empire recruits Bel Riose to investigate the resurgent Foundation. Hari leads Gaal and Salvor to a desert planet.

Episodes.Title: Where the Stars Are Scattered Thinly
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Cassian Bilton, Terrence Mann
Episodes.Plot: Queen Sareth and Dawn share a moment as she tries to learn more about Day. Brothers Constant and Poly bring Hober Mallow to Terminus.

Episodes.Title: The Sighted and the Seen
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Gaal, Salvor and Hari arrive on Ignis and meet the source of a strange signal they've been tracking. Dawn and Dusk are suspicious of Day.

Episodes.Title: Why the Gods Made Wine
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lou Llobell, Leah Harvey
Episodes.Plot: Day and Queen Sareth make an announcement. Tellem sows seeds of distrust between Gaal and Hari. Hober Mallow reaches his destination.

Episodes.Title: A Necessary Death
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Salvor begins to question the Mentalics' motives. Hober Mallow's proposal to the Spacers meets resistance. Brothers Constant and Poly stand trial.

Episodes.Title: The Last Empress
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Enjoiner Rue confides in Dusk about her distrust of Demerzel. Hober Mallow pulls a daring move. Day sets course for Terminus and the Foundation.

Episodes.Title: Long Ago, Not Far Away
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Dusk and Enjoiner Rue learn Demerzel's origin and true purpose. Tellem's plans for Gaal take a dark turn. On Terminus, Day confronts Dr. Seldon.

Episodes.Title: Creation Myths
Episodes.Writer: Isaac Asimov, David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
Episodes.Actors: Jared Harris, Lee Pace, Lou Llobell
Episodes.Plot: Season finale. Gaal, Salvor, and Hari chart a new path forward on Ignis. Demerzel heads to Trantor, taking actions that will change Empire forever.
